address2: SCOPE Complex 7 Institutional Area Lodhi Road
longBusinessSummary: NTPC Green Energy Limited engages in the renewable energy generation business in India. The company has a portfolio of 11,571 MWs solar and wind projects. It offers consultancy services. The company was incorporated in 2022 and is based in New Delhi, India. NTPC Green Energy Limited is a subsidiary of NTPC Limited.
